channel.title: Spawning multiple objects at the same time
channel.description:
I'm currently coding farming for my server, and as some of you may know, a lot of "object spawning" or "object replacing" is involved with this skill.
I normally spawn/replace objects in a loop, which has been going pretty well until I've started to do this on patches with 20+ tiles. Because the objects are being created in a loop, you can visually see the objects spawning one at a time.
I was wondering if there is a way to spawn these objects all in unison, rather than in a loop one at a time.
